sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Travelers Companies ( TRV ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 4.1%.
Year to date, Travelers Companies registers a 6.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ), trading down 2.7%.
Procter & Gamble Company is lower by about 2.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Johnson & Johnson ( JNJ ), trading down 1.3%, and General Electric ( GE ), trading up 2.5% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
